mapper.select: select STU_CD,GRADE,STU_SEMESTER,ADM_DATE,NATION,TL_TRY_COUNT,comm_cd_func('acaStateCd',aca_state_cd) as aca_state_cd,COMPANY_CD,CLUB_CD, SEC_CD,NAME,ENAME,PHONE,ZIPCODE,ADD1,ADD2,EMAIL,BANK_NAME,ACC_HOLDER,ACC_NUM,BIRTHDAY,MBTI_CD,ANO_CD from student where stu_cd = #{stuCd}

select(select major_name from major m,stu_major sm where m.major_cd=sm.major_cd and stu_id= #{stuCd} and maj_class_cd='1') as fir_maj_name, (select major_name from major m,stu_major sm where m.major_cd=sm.major_cd and stu_id= #{stuCd} and maj_class_cd='2') as sec_maj_name, (select major_name from major m,stu_major sm where m.major_cd=sm.major_cd and stu_id= #{stuCd} and maj_class_cd='3') as thi_maj_name, (select major_name from major m,stu_major sm where m.major_cd=sm.major_cd and stu_id= #{stuCd} and maj_class_cd='4') as sub_maj_name, (select col_name from college where col_cd=(select college_cd from major where major_cd = (select major_cd from stu_major where maj_class_cd='1' and stu_id= #{stuCd}))) as col_name from dual

select stu_cd,grade,name,phone,email, (select major_name from major m,stu_major sm where m.major_cd=sm.major_cd and stu_id= #{stuCd} and maj_class_cd='1') as fir_maj_name, (select col_name from college where col_cd=(select college_cd from major where major_cd = (select major_cd from stu_major where maj_class_cd='1' and stu_id=#{stuCd}))) as col_name from student

select STU_CD, GRADE, STU_SEMESTER, ADM_DATE, NATION, TL_TRY_COUNT, ACA_STATE_CD, COMPANY_CD, CLUB_CD, SEC_CD, NAME, ENAME, PHONE, ZIPCODE, ADD1, ADD2, EMAIL, BANK_NAME, ACC_HOLDER, ACC_NUM, BIRTHDAY, MBTI_CD, ANO_CD ,maj_class_cd from student s,stu_major sm where stu_cd = stu_id and major_cd = #{majorCd}
select col_name_func(#{stuCd}) as col_name,major_name_func(#{stuCd}) as fir_maj_name from dual
select sum(credit) total_credit from lec l, syllabus s,lec_manage lm where l.lec_cd=s.syl_cd and s.subj_cd=lm.subj_cd and l.stu_cd=#{stuCd}
select (2*(grade-1)+stu_semester) as total_seme from student where stu_cd=#{stuCd}
